channel.title: Few questions. Help please
channel.description:
I got a few quick questions few about client and few about server.
Client:
When its loading can you have it say "Loading please wait..." in the loading bar the whole time till its done?
Can you change the colour of the loading bar?
When I run the client at the top wimdow it says the persons name who created it how can I change this because im editing the client. I checked client but its not there.
How can I tell if the client has the bando's/ other new NPC's
Server
is there a way to change the ::pickup that you don't need to do ::pickup 00995 and just 0995 and still be able to code Jagex items?
Thankyou if you can answer any one thats great thanks and if you can't thanks for trying :)

item.title: Few questions. Help please
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

how do you change the colour of the loading bar?

item.title: Few questions. Help please
item.dc:creator: @fvgbak fvgbak
item.description:
@fvgbak wrote:

Client:

When its loading can you have it say “Loading please wait…” in the loading bar the whole time till its done?

Yeh

Can you change the colour of the loading bar?

yeh

How can I tell if the client has the bando's/ other new NPC's

Spawn em…

Yeh

edit

is there a way to change the ::pickup that you don't need to do ::pickup 00995 and just 0995 and still be able to code Jagex items?

That is a command in your client.java… im sure there is a way to fix that up.

Read full topic
